detaileddescription.para: 设备是否为iPhone 4/4S 分辨率320x480，像素640x960，@2x

设备是否为iPhone 6 Plus 分辨率414x736，像素1242x2208，@3x

memberdef.name: ShowAlert
memberdef.initializer: UIAlertView *alert = [[UIAlertView alloc] initWithTitle:@"Warning." message:nil delegate:self cancelButtonTitle:@"cancel" otherButtonTitles: @"OK"];[alert show];
